name: Attitudes Matter
description:
Out of Control
That was this years theme for the GMTK 2020, and there is alot of things that are out of control. In my time in life, I always strive to make others happy, so made a small simple game about making others happy. How does this fit the theme? Well:

"No-matter what you do, you have no control how your actions impact those around you and how there reactions can affect others."

Therefore during this game you can move, and use your four interaction buttons to interact with the world. You can do four different interactions:

  • Sing.
  • Talk.
  • Throw Money.
  • Give Chocolate.

You may not be able to control how others react, but you can try your hardest to make everyone happy. Not everyone is possible to make happy. Post your high score (vibe in the top-left ) in the chat so we can see how well you did! I hope you enjoy!

Controls
Move: 

Keyboard: WASD, Arrow Keys
Controller: DPAD, Left Stick

Interaction Keys:
Keyboard: IJKL, 8456 Numpad
Controller: YXAB, Right Stick
